00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"

00029 #include "kvi_pointerhashtable.h"
00030 #include "kvi_qstring.h"

00032 #include "kvi_kvs_variant.h"
00033 #include "kvi_heapobject.h"
00034 
00035 typedef KVIRC_API_TYPEDEF KviPointerHashTableIterator<QString,KviKvsVariant> KviKvsHashIterator;
00036 
00037 // This class must not have virtual funcitons nor destructor
00038 // Otherwise it will happily crash on windows when it is
00039 // allocated in modules and destroyed anywhere else around...
00040 class KVIRC_API KviKvsHash : public KviHeapObject
00041 {
00042 public:
00043         KviKvsHash();
00044         KviKvsHash(const KviKvsHash &h);
00045         ~KviKvsHash();
00046 protected:
00047         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsVariant> * m_pDict;
00048 public:
00049         void unset(const QString &szKey){ m_pDict->remove(szKey); };
00050         void set(const QString &szKey,KviKvsVariant * pVal){ m_pDict->replace(szKey,pVal); };
00051         KviKvsVariant * find(const QString &szKey) const { return m_pDict->find(szKey); };
00052         KviKvsVariant * get(const QString &szKey);
00053 
00054         bool isEmpty() const { return m_pDict->isEmpty(); };
00055         kvs_uint_t size() const { return m_pDict->count(); };
00056 
00057         void appendAsString(QString &szBuffer) const;
00058 
00059         const KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsVariant> * dict(){ return m_pDict; };
00060 
00061         void serialize(QString& result);
00062 };
00063 
00064 #endif //!_KVI_KVS_HASH_H_
